titles.title: Working Family Child Assistance Act
To amend the Internal Revenue Code of 1986 to modify the income threshold used to calculate the refundable portion of the child tax credit.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Ways and Means.

bill.summary:
5/3/2007--Introduced.
Working Family Child Assistance Act - Amends the Internal Revneue Code to: (1) revise the income threshold formula for calculating the refundable portion of the child tax credit; and (2) repeal the annual inflation adjustment to the threshold amount.
